text: Chỉ chờ có vậy gã liền rút tay ra, bồng anh lên. Loạng choạng một chút nhưng vẫn giữ được anh trong tay. Mihawk tựa hẳn người vào gã. Chân anh vòng qua eo gã, giữ chặt lại, tay thì vòng qua cổ ôm lấy. Shanks bước ra khỏi bồn. Âm thanh nước chảy rào rạt. Chúng nhỏ xuống sàn, lan đến tận giường. Shanks sẽ nghĩ đến việc dọn dẹp sau. Gã thả nhẹ anh lên giường, trườn lên ngay, không muốn để môi anh lạnh đi. Mihawk ôm đầu gã bằng cả hai tay, ngón tay luồn vào tóc giữ lấy. Chân anh vẫn vòng quanh eo gã. Anh nâng thân dưới lên một chút rồi ấn mông xuống, cạ lên vật nóng và cứng bên dưới. Mihawk có còn nhớ kích cỡ của gã không? Shanks tự hỏi. Liệu lúc nãy gã đã chuẩn bị cho anh đủ chưa? Suy nghĩ trong đầu gã lớn đến nỗi bị anh nghe thấy. Anh dứt môi ra, nhìn gã, tay đặt lên mặt gã.
trans: Just waiting for that, he pulled his hand out and picked him up. Staggering a little, he could still hold him firm in his arms. Mihawk leaned his whole body against him. His legs wrapped around his waist, holding on tight, his arms were around his neck. Shanks got out of the tub. There was the sound of water splitting out, dripping onto the floor, spreading to the bed. Shanks would think of cleaning up later on. He gently dropped him onto the bed, crawling up immediately since he did not want his lips to turn cold. Mihawk held his head with both of his hands, his fingers threaded through his hair to hold him. His legs were still around his waist. He lifted his lower body slightly up, rubbing against the hot, hard thing below. He wondered if Mihawk still remembered his size, whether he had prepared him enough just before. The thought in his head was so loud that he was able to hear it. He pulled his lips away, looked at him with his hand on his face.
